text: Luciano Zardi (born 15 September 1930) is an Italian weightlifter. He competed in the men's middle heavyweight event at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born on 15 September 1930. == Notes == == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:People from Ferrara Category:Living people Category:1930 births Category:Weightlifters
title: Luciano Zardi
